html:
obstinate. The Lord knew that many Church members would be stubborn, unyielding, hard of heart (Ezek. 3:7-9).

neck is an iron sinew. This term describes Church members who will not bow before the Lord (Deut. 9:6; 31:27).

brow brass. This phrase describes Church members who will not give their mind or thoughts to the Lord (Ezek. 3:9).
